import React from "react"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import Card from "../components/Card"; import Loader from "./Loader"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; function HomePage() { const [movie, setMovie] = useState(['']) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true) const options = { method: 'GET', headers: { accept: 'application/json', Authorization: 'Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJhdWQiOiI2Y2RhYjEzOTcxZTA4NmU3Zjc2YTdmZDI4ZmU2YTFhZCIsInN1YiI6IjYzYjAxOWQxNTc1MzBlMDA4NTAxM2FmMiIsInNjb3BlcyI6WyJhcGlfcmVhZCJdLCJ2ZXJzaW9uIjoxfQ.JZkce-xL6W_73mKqWEjqa-lcWH8oXbJ_2bq56tw85bQ' } }; useEffect(()=> { fetch('https://api.themoviedb.org/3/discover/movie?include_adult=false&include_video=false&language=en-US&page=1&sort_by=popularity.desc', options) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { setMovie((data.results).slice(0, 10)) console.log(data.results) }) .catch(err => console.error(err)); if(movie) { setLoading(false) } }, [loading]) const topMovies = movie.map((topMovie, i)=> { return (
) }) return (
